title: TMGW #189: Grace and Mamrie Invent a Holiday
description:
This week, Grace and Mamrie discuss Grace’s final project, Marvin the Martian, Mamrie becoming a Sommelier and how to make it on the D-List.

Go to http://hellofresh.com/tmgw16 and use code TMGW16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts!

Go to http://upstart.com/tmgw to check out your rate.

Go to http://takecareof.com and use code TMGW50 for 50% off your first Care/of order.

Go to http://stitchfix.com/tmgw to get $20 off your first purchase.
